press_button.description: Press the button to turn on the oven.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob to adjust the temperature setting of the oven.

clean_oven_body.description: Clean the oven body to remove any food particles or stains.

clean_button.description: Clean the button to keep it free from dirt and grime.

rotate_and_press.description: Rotate the knob and press the power button to start the oven.

whole_oven_maintenance.description: Perform general maintenance on the oven by cleaning the oven body, knob and button, then press the button and rotate the knob to check their functionality.
